snippet.title: Tiny Pixel Planets Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tiny Pixel Planets on steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3208770/Tiny_Pixel_Planets/
Play the game now on itch.io!
https://sp-possibilities.itch.io/tiny-pixel-planets

Tiny Pixel Planets is now officially released! Updates for the game will slow now that the game is mostly finished, but patches will still be released. Thanks for everyone that has played and shared feedback for the game the past 2 years, it was a long journey that couldn't have been done without you!

#gameteaser #indiegamedevelopment #gaming #gameannouncement
